## Testing

### Testing Checklist
- [ ] HTML validates (W3C Validator)
- [ ] CSS validates (CSS Validator)
- [ ] Accessibility tested (WAVE or similar)
- [ ] Mobile responsive (tested on multiple screen sizes)
- [ ] Cross-browser tested (Chrome, Firefox, Safari, Edge)
- [ ] All links work correctly
- [ ] No console errors
- [ ] Dark mode works correctly (if applicable)
- [ ] Print layout looks good (if applicable)

## Checklist
